body:
So I got really bored and for some reason decided I would start making a wiki for the community since there is not one even though good ol MCZone had one. Its not official or anything but I thought it would be a nice way for the community to all contribute and take part in this plus in the process, with all the combined knowledge it might actually help people!

I'd love to have a section in particular about the history of the community from McZone to Avicus and inbetween so an older member of the community would be nice if they helped.

http://avicusnetwork.wikia.com/wiki/AvicusNetwork_Wiki

Anyway thats all I have done so far. The main page and the minigame page which will have links in it to the minigames in more detail.

title: Unofficial Avicus Wiki

replies.body: steven made one already http://unofficial-avicus-wiki.weebly.com/
replies.body_tagged: steven made one already http://unofficial-avicus-wiki.weebly.com/

replies.body:
This one will be a little different ^^
We will go into detail on the history and gamemodes more and include some other things that I don't see on his.

Plus his is not really a wiki.. no one but him can contribute to it. This one, anyone is free to contribute :)
